appetizers.name: Lentil Soup
appetizers.description: Yellow lentil soup with a touch of garlic.

appetizers.name: Chicken Seekh Kabob
appetizers.description: Minced chicken lightly spiced, cooked in the tandoor oven.

appetizers.name: Beetroot Tikki
appetizers.description: Beetroot, potatoes and spiced patties, fried to perfection.

entrees.name: Punjabi Kadi Pakora
entrees.description: A traditional dish from Punjab made with yogurt, chic-pea flour, spices and mix vegetables fritters.

entrees.name: Nargisi Chicken Kofta
entrees.description: Chicken and fresh spinach croquets, in a creamy cashew sauce.

entrees.name: Lamb and Turnip
entrees.description: Lamb Cubes cooked with lightly spiced turnip in a thick curry sauce.

entrees.name: Seafood Vindaloo
entrees.description: Shrimps, tilapia and scallops cooked in a spicy curry sauce with a touch of garlic.
